24004697.Brief effect description: Performs an additional super attack when attacking
24004697.Line description: Performs an additional super attack when attacking
24004697.Paragraph Title: When  the target enemy is in the following status{passiveImg:atk_down} or {passiveImg:def_down} or {passiveImg:stun} or {passiveImg:astute}

Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- ATK & DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Chance of evading enemy's attack 40%{passiveImg:up_g}
- All allies' Ki +1 and DEF 40%{passiveImg:up_g}, plus an additional Ki +1
and DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g} for characters who also belong to the
"Peppy Gals" Category
*When attacking*
- ATK & DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
- ATK & DEF 50%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 200%) and chance of evading
enemy's attack & damage reduction rate 10%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 40%)
per "Peppy Gals" Category ally on the team
*After receiving or evading an attack*
- All allies' ATK 20%{passiveImg:up_g} ("Peppy Gals" Category allies excluded)
- "Peppy Gals" Category allies' ATK 20%{passiveImg:up_g} for 2 turns
*When facing only 1 enemy*
- Attacked enemy's ATK & DEF 30%{passiveImg:down_y} for 2 turns
- Great chance of stunning the attacked enemy for 2 turns
- Great chance of sealing the attacked enemy's Super Attack
for 2 turns
*When the target enemy is in the following status: {passiveImg:atk_down},
{passiveImg:def_down}, {passiveImg:stun} or {passiveImg:astute}*
- Launches an additional Super Attack
